overview:
Co-Founder and CEO of BitBend LLC

A passionate entrepreneur and senior executive with 20+ years of experience in developing and implementing strategic initiatives by bridging international business requirements with the latest technical and commercial opportunities.

Robert has built his career in a combination of entrepreneurial start-ups and senior roles at global public companies. From CEO positions within innovative new businesses to Managing Director levels at Wall St firms and international technology companies, Robert has built significant experience in several fields.

His current initiative BitBend takes his deep understanding of the financial markets and associated technologies and applies them to the travel sector.
